cab.content: 117From Viceroy, Foreigneigii Depart merit,, 17th July 1919.(Received 17th, 8.30 p.m.)1048 S. Secret. Afghanistan. Following from Peshawar, 15th July : " On the 14th instant Political Agent held further conversation with Nasrulla Khan's messenger, who said that Kohistan people are much annoyed with Amanulla for putting their clansman Mustauli Muhammad Husain to death. He also informed Political Agent on authority of Nasrulla Khan that Amanulla and his counsellors are anxious to prove to Hindus and Musalmans of India that Amir has taken up arms on account of tyranny and oppression practised by British against them, and for this reason (corrupt group) selected Diwan Narinjan Das and others as Peace delegates. Demands will probabiy be made for concessions to Hindus and Musalmans in India, which should not be granted as it would 'greatly strengthen Amir's influence with Indians."e
